info.description: VMware Cloud SaaS Platform public APIs
info.title: Common SaaS Platform APIs

post.summary: Exchange client credentials to access token
post.description:
The end-point is for exchanging client credentials to access token.
 Include the client_credentials grant type parameter using the application/x-www-form-urlencoded format in the HTTP request body

Retrieve the public key to be used for verifying the IdP generated tokens signature.

post.summary: Exchange org scoped Refresh Token to user Access Token
post.description:
The end-point is for exchanging org scoped refresh-tokens only, that are obtained from the CSP UI.There are 2 ways of using this end-point:
- Option 1: Passing the refresh token as a query param.
- Option 2: Including the refresh token parameter using the application/x-www-form-urlencoded format in the HTTP request body

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Option 2: Passing refresh_token=VALUE using application/x-www-form-urlencoded format in the HTTP request body
